subject: Re: Dear friend ,
body:
Hello 
 
Thanks for your response and like I said before , I have brain tumor and I will be going in for my surgery operation by next week, I contacted you because I need who I can entrust this large $12 million dollars with as I have no relatives 
I also attached my picture for your reference, i would love you to assist the less privileged once in your city, open church's , give to the orphans and most especially help the poor around the world. 
If you can handle this, 
 
I will be very happy and in return of this massage, I will direct you to my bank as the next KIN of inheritance funds, but I don't want you to let me down because the doctors have told me that I have 50/50 chance to survive the operation as an 78 years I know I will be very happy if you can carry out this wishes for me even if I didn't survive the operation, but I will be very happy with you 
 
I need rest a little to await for your urgent response 
Thanks 
Mrs Joanne Reyes 
Texas USA 
 
 
 
 Sent: Friday, February 02, 2024 at 9:34 PM From: "John" <bc46676@***.com> To: joannereyes011@mail.com Subject: Re: Dear friend , 
 
Hello Mrs. Joanne Reyes, 
I'm sorry to hear about your health condition and I hope your surgery goes well. It's very kind of you to think of others during such a difficult time. 
You mentioned a donation, could you please provide more details about it? How did you come across my contact information? 
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Best wishes, 
John
